about_the_game:
Gavin Tyler's Game Collection is a collection of old games released by Gavin Tyler. It goes from his earliest work to his newest. Some games are bad, while some games are good. There are 7 games in total!

GAMES LIST:



- Rage Game: The Game
The first game released by Gavin Tyler! Can you finish all levels without dying?

- Rage Game: The Game Cancelled Demo
A "polished" version of the original Rage Game: The Game, with one large level!

- Room Service
A jam game for "Secret Santa Jam". You work as a janitor at a sketchy hotel!

- Passageways 3D
A roguelike horror game about endless passageways. How long can you survive until the comic monsters catch you?

- Passageways 3D Dev Version
A developer version of Passageways 3D. This is the first time it is being publicly released!

- Bus Survivalist
Originally made as a joke, Bus Survivalist is a game about trying to withstand a bus ride to school. The catch? It's the elementary bus!

- Gavin's Wonderhouse
Gavin's Wonderhouse is a parody of the typical mascot horror game. Grab all the birthday cake you can before getting caught by Gavin!

highlighted.name: Rage Game Demo: I haven't died in 5 months!
Rage Game Demo: Winner Winner Chicken Dinner

name: Gavin Tyler's Game Collection

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200, AMD Athlon XE BE-2300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes.
  • Additional Notes: Some games may have different requirements than others.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 (Pascal), AMD Radeon RX 460 (GCN 4.0)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes.
  • Additional Notes: Some games may have different requirements than others.

short_description: A collection of classic games made by Gavin Tyler, now for the first time on Steam!
